mapper.update: update ecs_attribute set cat_id = #{catId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, attr_name = #{attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_input_type = #{attrInputType,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_type = #{attrType,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_index = #{attrIndex,jdbcType=BIT}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_linked = #{isLinked,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_group = #{attrGroup,jdbcType=BIT}, is_attr_gallery = #{isAttrGallery,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_txm = #{attrTxm,jdbcType=BIT}, attr_values = #{attrValues,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select attr_id, cat_id, attr_name, attr_input_type, attr_type, attr_index, sort_order, is_linked, attr_group, is_attr_gallery, attr_txm, attr_values from ecs_attribute where attr_id = #{attrId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
